Name: Ballroom
Ingredients: 22.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: As Jason, the creator of this scotch and coffee cocktail, says, it's "redolent of a freshly polished ballroom floor (in a good way!)"
History: Adapted from a recipe created in January 2020 by Jason E. Clapham of Clapham Cocktails, Oxford, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Ballroom contains 198 calories
